0100101000010011 0100110000000110 1 -> sum: 1001011000011010, cout: 0
1010111010111011 1010110110001111 0 -> sum: 0101110001001010, cout: 1

1010000110000011 0010111111111010 0 -> sum: 1101000101111101, cout: 0
1011101001101001 1000001001110101 1 -> sum: 0011110011011111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
